page.title: 17SUMMER PLAYSCHEMES
page.content: Scamps is a playscheme for children aged 5-14. It goeson for 2 weeks in August at Chiltern Edge School. It is run by parents for the children of the village. It costs you one pound and fifty pence. Scamps stands for Sonning Common Adventure Midsummer playscheme. Peploe take it in turn to help with trips. There are lots of trips like: Thorpe Park,Butlins and others. When you go to scamps you have ast be worn at all times. There is a lady from the Red Cross there always. There are alot of helpers, one of which is my Mum. At scamps you can do modelling,sewing,and lots of other things aswell. The lunch break is at 1o'clock to 2o'clock. When you have hadlunch you have to wait for the helpers before you start any activities.
